cause.description:
If you haven't seen the video yet, you're urged to watch. It will only take a few minutes of your time, and in those few minutes open up your eyes to a practice most of us never knew existed: the decimation of dolphins to be sold as 'whale' meat in Japan. Dolphins are butchered, slaughtered and killed without compassion or care; these mammals either bleed to death or suffocate, and in a way that is difficult to watch, much less sit by and allow. Please help put an end to the bloodshed.
Video: http://www.glumbert.com/media/dolphin
You can also help put a stop to this by signing the petition at: http://www.petitiononline.com/golfinho
1. All living things have the right to choose their own fate, unless proven otherwise based on actions and choices.
2. Animal abuse is illegal, of which this is a prime example.
cause.mission: Put an end to the inhumane slaughter of Dolphins in Japan.
cause.name: Dolphin Massacre in Japan
